SEARCH
Module gamecritic
Package gui_interfaces

Interface StyleInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
GamesController, GameViewController, HomeController, LoginController, ProfileController, RegisterController, ReviewController, ReviewViewController, YearDetailsController, YearsController
public interface StyleInterface
Interface that defines set of constant string values and methods. These constants represent color codes that can be used in different parts of the application for consistency of styles.
